1.text: Some containers not running or ready

targets.expr:
min by (pod) (
  max(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="deploy/mo-camunda"}) by(pod)
  * on (pod) group_right()
  (
    (
      (min by (pod, phase) (label_replace(min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]), "phase", "Ready", "", "")) == 1) * 0 + 0
    )
    or on(pod)
    (
      (min by (pod, phase) (min_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) == 1) * 0
      + on(phase) group_left()
      (
        label_replace(vector(1), "phase", "Running", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(2), "phase", "Pending", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(3), "phase", "Unknown", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(4), "phase", "Failed", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(5), "phase", "Succeeded", "", "")
      )
    )
  )  
)

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_detail_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace=~"$namespace", service="public-api", status=~"5.."}[$span])) by (ingress, service, service_port) > 0
sum(rate(ingress_nginx_detail_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace=~"$namespace", service="camunda-api", status=~"5.."}[$span])) by (ingress, service, service_port) > 0
sum(rate(ingress_nginx_detail_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace=~"$namespace", service="storage-service", status=~"5.."}[$span])) by (ingress, service, service_port) > 0
sum(rate(ingress_nginx_detail_requests_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~".*", service="file-manager"}[$span])) by (ingress, service, service_port) > 0
sum(rate(ingress_nginx_detail_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace=~"$namespace", service="file-manager", status=~"5.."}[$span])) by (ingress, service, service_port) > 0
